name: Unigraph (Ordinals)
description: Welcome to $GRPH - Unigraph Decentralized indexer for Bitcoin based token standards About Unigraph: Unigraph aims to be the first open sourced, decentralised indexer for Bitcoin Standards. Unigraph indexer will be managed by a network of node operators, that is open to anyone by staking GRPH tokens. This paves the way for a non-custodial DeFi landscape to be built. This is just the start of our mission so stay tuned for further updates, but be sure to check out the official links below.
